abstract.t: DNSSEC is trying to be deployed everywhere. Many are afraid ofDNSSEC deployment, which are too heavy to be deployed. There is ahuge gap between the resources we need to deploy DNSSEC and thebenefits or security we can get from the DNSSEC. This documentproposes a lightweight DNSSEC mechanism to make the DNSSEC to bedeployed easily while getting the similar security with the heavyDNSSEC.
